mapper.insert: insert into doctor (id, user_id, name, sex, phone, worked_time, level, hospital, department_id) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{workedTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{level,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{hospital,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{departmentId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update doctor set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=CHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, worked_time = #{workedTime,jdbcType=DATE}, level = #{level,jdbcType=CHAR}, hospital = #{hospital,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, department_id = #{departmentId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, user_id, name, sex, phone, worked_time, level, hospital, department_id from doctor
